rows.segment_description: Google Cloud segment includes cloud computing services and infrastructure offerings. It is reported separately from Google Services and Other Bets, reflecting its distinct business focus within Alphabet. The segment's profitability and revenue are tracked independently to highlight its performance.
rows.primary_source: 10-K Part I, Item 1 Business and Note 15

rows.segment_description: Google Services segment encompasses a broad range of consumer and advertiser-facing products and platforms. This includes Google Search, YouTube advertising, Google Network, and Google subscriptions, platforms, and devices. The segment represents the core business operations generating significant revenue and operating income.
rows.primary_source: 10-K Part I, Item 1 Business and Note 15

rows.segment_description: Other Bets segment includes Alphabet's experimental and emerging businesses outside of Google Services and Google Cloud. This segment typically operates at a loss and includes various projects and companies that are in development or early stages. It is reported separately to distinguish these ventures from the main business segments.
rows.primary_source: 10-K Part I, Item 1 Business and Note 15
